Bar Chart with a Minimap

minimap.Rmd

This example has been adapted from Vega-Lite.

library(dplyr)
library(jsonlite)
library(virgo)

selection <- select_interval(encodings = "y")

cars <- fromJSON("https://vega.github.io/vega-editor/app/data/cars.json") %>% 
  count(Name) %>% 
  mutate(Name = reorder(Name, -n))

minimap <- cars %>% 
  vega(width = 50, height = 200) %>% 
  mark_bar(
    enc(
      x = n, 
      y = Name, 
    ),
    selection = I(selection),
  ) %>% 
  config(axis = list(NULL))

bar <- cars %>% 
  vega(height = 800) %>% 
    mark_bar(
    enc(
      x = n, 
      y = Name, 
    ),
    selection = selection,
  ) %>% 
  scale_x(domain = c(0,6)) %>% 
  scale_y(title = "Count", orient = "top")

hconcat(bar, minimap)

Developed by Earo Wang, Stuart Lee.
